resources.string: Lokanāth Swāmi Lectures and Kirtans App

With Lokanāth Swāmi Lectures and Kirtans App, you have access to vast collection of His Holiness Lokanāth Swāmi\'s melodious kirtans and lectures, Śrīla Prabhupāda\'s Books, and Śrīla Prabhupāda\'s daily quotes.\n\n Lokanath Swami (born 1949) is an ISKCON guru from India. He is a senior disciple of A. C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada (the founder of ISKCON). Lokanatha Swami oversees ISKCON activities and preaching in Maharashtra and Noida, and serves on the Governing Body Commission of ISKCON as a Minister of Padayatra. Lokanatha Swami is involved with various worldwide ISKCON preaching activities. He travels in India and in the West, giving discourses on Bhagavad Gita and other Hindu texts.

With Lokanāth Swāmi Lectures and Kirtans App, you have access to vast collection of His Holiness Lokanāth Swāmi\'s melodious kirtans and lectures, Śrīla Prabhupāda\'s Books, and Śrīla Prabhupāda\'s daily quotes.
